name: lenrsmith/evapi-php
description: evapi-php is an API client written in PHP for connecting to the ExaVault API. The ExaVault API is a REST-like API providing operations for file and user management, and supports both POST and GET requests. This composer package the packages the original library (https://github.com/ExaVault/evapi-php) so that it can be easily installe via composer.
